description:
Inspired by Edge – Western Australia’s premium and award-winning apartment developer – the architecturally-designed “Vantage RiversEdge Apartments” complex along our picturesque Swan River is where you will discover this impressive 2 bedroom 2 bathroom corner apartment that benefits from stunning westerly views of the Perth city skyline, our world-class Optus Stadium and the glistening river waterline itself.

You will be amazed at just how secure entry into this sublime building actually is, via a magnificent lobby with its own front reception desk and lounge. Amongst the phenomenal resort-style facilities available to you in addition are a sauna, an air-conditioned gym, a full theatre room, toilets, a generous covered alfresco and barbecue entertaining deck, a huge common open-plan living and dining area (with an open fireplace, reverse-cycle air-conditioning, its own kitchen, a second outdoor barbecue and integrated audio speakers), an expansive infinity-edge swimming pool and a bubbling outdoor spa. And that’s just on the ground floor, where the river and stadium vista will capture your imagination even further.

Up on the rooftop, an outdoor cinema with seating areas and speakers and another large alfresco deck with two more full kitchens with barbecues are complemented by an awe-inspiring 270-degree outlook towards the inland suburbs, the hills, Perth Airport, the stadium, Crown, the river and the CBD. Don’t forget about your two secure basement parking bays, a lock-up storeroom, the Hikvision A/V intercom system and secure bicycle and kayak storage. It’s pure bliss – and like nothing you will have ever come across before.

As for your own apartment, secure lift access takes you straight upstairs where abundant natural light – created by floor-to-ceiling bedroom and living-area windows – makes things rather pleasant indeed. There is a dedicated built-in study nook too, off the central hub of an open-plan living, dining and kitchen area, where you will spend most of your casual time.

The kitchen itself oozes class in the form of sleek stone bench tops, double sinks, a modern dishwasher, high-end integrated cooking appliances and a stylish pendant light fittings – above the island breakfast bar. A private and covered corner alfresco-style balcony off the living space absorbs the all-encompassing panoramic view that is shared by the bedrooms, living area and even the kitchen.

Both bedrooms are large in size and have built-in wardrobes, with the master also enjoying ensuite access into a private and well-appointed bathroom with a shower, toilet and vanity. The second bathroom-come-laundry next to the entry has a large shower, a toilet, a powder vanity and plenty of built-in storage.

In close proximity to both the city and Perth Airport, this prime development also backs on to the sprawling riverside Cracknell Park and finds itself nestled near to restaurants, public transport, Ascot Racecourse, the Crown Entertainment and Casino Complex at Burswood, Optus Stadium next door, the freeway, Perth’s vibrant CBD and surrounding entertainment hubs. Several linking highways, top schools and excellent shopping centres are also very handy. Uncompromising riverside luxury awaits you, here – and in more ways than one!


Other features include, but are not limited to;

• Linen/storage cupboard off the living area
• Sleek white custom media cabinetry
• European AEG kitchen appliances – including the dishwasher
• Engineered wooden floorboards
• Ducted air-conditioning
• Down lights
• CCTV security-camera system to the complex
• Pet-friendly complex
• Under-cover visitor-parking bays
• Additional off-road parking bays for guests and visitors
